title: Privacy Policy
intro: This Privacy Policy describes how personal data is processed within the Flovers mobile application and its associated backend services.

admin.title: 1. Data Controller
admin.text: The controller of personal data is the owner of the Flovers application. For matters related to personal data protection, please contact us via the email address provided in the Contact section.

scope.title: 2. Scope of processed data
scope.text: We process only the data necessary for the proper operation of the application, delivery of its features, and ensuring user security.
